feedback.title: Send Feedback
text: TODO FROM DRUPAL We respond to feedback submitted in Finnish, Swedish or English. Unfortunately, we cannot reply to feedback written in other languages.
The feedback form has an automatic spam filter. Do not include links in feedback.

We will only respond to feedback concerning the InfoFinland website. Please understand that we do not provide advice or counselling on the management of your affairs. Counselling services are listed on the InfoFinland page Call and ask for advice.
feedback.info2: Name, email and feedback text are all required information.

states.fail: We were unable to send your message. Please try again

languageMessage.title: Would you like to change the language?
languageMessage.text: Infofinland website is available in 12 languages. Would you like to change to your preferred language?

footer.helsinkiDisclaimer: The InfoFinland website is published by the City of Helsinki, and it is funded by the state and the InfoFinland member municipalities.
